author: stefan2
msg: On the fsfs-improvements branch:  Introduce a representation_header_t
cache.  That way, build_rep_list and friends can be driven entirely
from cache, i.e. delta caching is sufficient to repopulate fulltext
As part of this, we delay opening the shared file element in the
representation read state until we actually have to access the file.
(rep_state_t): add header_size member and allow start to be lazily set
auto_set_start_offset): new utility methods for lazy fopen
(create_rep_state_body): use & populate the cache; delay fopen
(get_window_key): we have to open the file before accessing it
get_contents): handle lazy fopen & struc initialization

author: ilgrosso
msg: [SYNCOPE-406] Using JPA entity listener for @PreUpdate and @PrePersit, removing AspectJ
